page.title: 04SOCIAL CONCERNS:GYPSIES
page.content: Potton has{one caravan site.}The caravan site is on the {outskirts of {Potton }on Myers Road. There has been a permanent site there for{eight years although travellers have been in the area on and off for{ten to fifteen {years.}The site is approximately{five {or six acres}and on it there are about {twenty five caravans.}There are{ {eighteen families}approximately on the site at present and all of them are related to each other. The caravans vary in size from approximately six to ten metres. Some of the people who live on the site go away for anything from two to six weeks for fruit picking, weddings or holidays. All {the Potton travellers}go to a big {summer Horse Fair}which is held annually in{Cambridge.
